talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I heard someone say "<clr:0000>Aaqlet<clr:ffff>" when I was
standing <clr:0000>by the shelf<clr:ffff> in the canteen down
in the shelter.
It must have been the voe in the
<clr:0000>jail<clr:ffff> talking...
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Now that you mention it...


I do remember something from when
Perda came back to town with little
Aaqlet in tow.
Didn't the guards mention they'd seen a
voe wandering about outside of town
around then?
talk0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>That <clr:0000>stupid<clr:ffff>,<clr:0000> weird orb<clr:ffff> was a terrible thing
to rest against.
talk0031:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Meanwhile, these sofas are the absolute
best. <sp:5:1:0>If I could, I would sit here forever.
talk0032:
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Ease>Most everyone has been avoiding eye contact
with this voe.

Well... They're probably all just shocked by his
terrible manners.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
talk0033:
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Ease>Most everyone who has been avoiding eye contact
with this voe.

Maybe he'll get down off the table sometime soon?<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>Yes, I'm sure of it! And it came from over
there <clr:0000>behind that shelf<clr:ffff>!
talk0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>So that voe they threw in jail really must
be <clr:0000>Perda<clr:ffff>'s husband, right?

But if that is the case...


Perda wouldn't even know! After all, she's
working at the <clr:0000>Gerudo Secret Club<clr:ffff>, so
<clr:0000>she's not in the shelter<clr:ffff>.
talk0034:
<snd:Sad_01>Ugh...<sp:5:1:0> I don't even want to think about
setting out in search of my true love...
talk0035:
<snd:Ease_01>It would be a lot easier if there were voe
somewhere nearby. <sp:5:0:0>Just...waiting for us
to discover them.
talk0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>It's true, I'm telling you!


I heard it<clr:0000> down in the canteen<clr:ffff> in the
shelter. The voice came from <clr:0000>behind
the shelf<clr:ffff>!
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Then the voe that's locked up in the
jail cell...

He must be <clr:0000>Perda<clr:ffff>'s husband after all.
talk0036:
<snd:Chat_00>What about that Hylian voe who helped
clear up the sand shroud?

He seemed OK...
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad>All this talk just makes me think I should
find a voe for myself too.
talk0037:
<snd:Chat_01>Yeah. I think he'd make an acceptable
partner, at least.

He is certainly strong. There's no doubt
about that.
talk0025: <sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice>Wait, is this about what you heard?
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I've been wondering if maybe it's <clr:0000>Perda<clr:ffff>'s
husband locked up in there...
talk0038:
<snd:Think_01>I agree. He's definitely OK at least.


Huh.<sp:5:0:0> Maybe he'd be worth a second look
the next time he comes to town?
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>So you know the voe that's been locked
up in <clr:0000>jail<clr:ffff>?
talk0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Yup. I heard it coming from<clr:0000> behind
that shelf<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:1:0>

I'm almost certain it was a voice
saying "<clr:0000>Aaqlet<clr:ffff>."
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:QuestionNormal>If that was the case, Perda would have
realized it by now though. <sp:5:1:0>Wouldn't she?
talk0039:
<snd:LaughS_00>Ooh, I like this idea! If one of us found our
true love without having to travel... That'd
be so easy!
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand>Oh yeah, the one that used the sand
shroud to try to sneak into town?
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>She's working at the <clr:0000>Gerudo Secret Club<clr:ffff>,
so <clr:0000>she's not in the shelter<clr:ffff>. Maybe that's
why she hasn't heard?
talk0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>That reminds me of something I heard
when Perda came back to town with little
Aaqlet in tow.
Didn't the guards mention they'd seen a
voe wandering about outside of town
around then?
talk0015:
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Ease>Most everyone has been avoiding eye contact
with this voe.

Including me...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
talk0028: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>That has to be who it is.
talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hey! What do you think you're up to?<sp:5:1:0>
I'm using that as a backrest right now, so
maybe...leave it alone?
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a00>It's not a great backrest though. Much too rigid...<sp:5:0:0>
Maybe one day I'll once more lounge on the sofas in
the canteen on the surface.<sp:5:0:0> One day...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>A little while ago, I went to grab
something from <clr:0000>that shelf <clr:ffff>over there...

And while I was standing there, I swear I
heard someone say "<clr:0000>Aaqlet<clr:ffff>."
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Hey, I've heard "Aaqlet" before. I think
that's the name of <clr:0000>Perda<clr:ffff>'s vehvi...
talk0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Ugh! Come on!<sp:5:0:0> What'd I just say?
I'm resting against that, so just...leave
it alone!
Aw, and I'd just gotten comfortable too!
Now I have to find that sweet spot again.

<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a00>It's not a great backrest though. Much too rigid...<sp:5:0:0>
Maybe one day I'll once more lounge on the sofas in
the canteen on the surface.<sp:5:0:0> One day...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You know, the jail is just on the other side
of that wall. The wall behind the shelf,
I mean.
talk0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Are you sure you really heard a voice
say "<clr:0000>Aaqlet<clr:ffff>"?
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You know that voe that's locked up in the
<clr:0000>jail down in the shelter<clr:ffff>?
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Well, I thought I heard someone say
"<clr:0000>Aaqlet<clr:ffff>" when I was standing <clr:0000>by the
shelf<clr:ffff> in the canteen down there.
